typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_col0_} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	container: 'sourcefolder',
	fileName: 'New Text Document.txt',
	columnDelimiter: '|',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(each(match(true()), $$ = ERROR_FUNCTION(''))) ~> DerivedColumn1
